title: [FiSH] Clannad (Hi10P Dual-Audio 480p DVDRip)
description:
All 24 episodes lovingly ripped and encoded from the US DVD release.
Don't be fooled by the small files: the audio is nearly flawless, and the video looks surprisingly good too!


Files: MKV @ ~128MB
Video: 10-bit H.264/AVC 16:9 720x480 @ ~410kbps
Audio 1: Japanese 48KHz AAC @ 128kbps
Audio 2: English 48KHz AAC @ 128kbps
Subtitles 1: English Dialogue (use this with Japanese audio)
Subtitles 2: English Signs and Songs (use this with English audio)
Chapters: Yes


Q: The video won't play, why not?
A: Your player doesn't support 10-bit encodes. Use a recent version of VLC, MPC-HC, or XBMC. If you're using something other than a PC, good luck.

Q: Is this English dubbed?
A: Yes, but you have to switch the audio track and subtitles first. On XBMC, I recommend modifying your keyboard config to add a shortcut key.
(http://www.maiman.net/2012/03/how-to-easily-switch-audio-languages-in-xbmc/)

Q: This looks like crap.
A: That's not a question. Go buy the official release if my encode isn't good enough.

Q: How did you get the files to be so small?
A: x264 is magical.


If you liked this show (how could you not?) then please buy the official DVDs or Blu-rays!
